DOC.brief_summary: Low intensity shockwaves ( 1/10 one use Lithotripsy ) deliver penile tissue . Shockwaves create special generator focus use specially design shockwave applicator apparatus . The shockwaves deliver applicator cover corpus cavernosa penis . In previous study investigator use medium focus probe study investigator evaluate result therapy use wide focus probe aim improve result treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy With Wide Focus Probe Treatment Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: ED 6 month At least 50 % unsuccessful attempt sexual intercourse 4 time 4 different day Positive response PDE5 inhibitor IIEF5 domain score 1220 denote mild severe ED NonNeurological pathology Stable heterosexual relationship 3 month NPT normal/flat Prior prostatectomy surgery Any cause ED vascular relate Any unstable medical , psychiatric , spinal cord injury , penile anatomical abnormality Clinically significant chronic hematological disease Cardiovascular condition prevent sexual activity History heart attack , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month . Cancer within past 5 year . Antiandrogens , oral injectable androgen Use treatment ED within 7 day screen include oral medication , vacuum device , constrictive device , injection urethral suppository
